site_home_section_profile_article: I'm an application developer. I have great passion for designing and coding. I've always loved to learn new technology skills.
I'm currently studying at Northern Alberta Institute of Technology in Edmonton, Alberta. Outside of classes, I do self-learning everyday and I build Web, Android and iOS applications.
I'm available for freelancing. I can help you with Application design, Web design, Web development and Software development.
site_home_section_latest_work_p: Look at some of my recent designs and programming works
site_home_section_discover_p: Everything about my designs and programming journey

site_home_section_discover_items.site_home_section_discover_item_p: In the year of 2005, I had an interested to make websites and application programming. Since then, I stopped playing computer and online games and spent all my time to self-learning HTML 4, CSS 2.1 and some Javascript.
I had a huge passion for learning programming language, and I picked Java as my next learning programming language. Later I adopted Spring Framework to build web application.
Since I started learning programming, I'm so hunger for programming knowledge. I started learning deeper languages like C, C++ and even deeper languages like Assembly language.

After building several web applications, I found that I need more networking and security knowledge to write a good piece of software code that ensure the high scalability of a software. Therefore, I started my network security studying in the year of 2008
I used to develop everything on windows, and since 2008, I tried to write everything on Linux OS and build application that runs on a Linux server.
I had my first iPhone in 2009. I started learning Objective-C in order to make iOS application.
As HTML 5 is getting more well-known and stable in the year of 2010, I started learning HTML 5 with CSS 3.
In the same year, I started learning to build Android application, which is programming in Java language.

As a fan of Java language, I used to make web application using Java. But I wanted some changes so that I started learning PHP by myself and advanced Javascript. I started building AJAX application which improves user experience.

site_home_section_discover_items.site_home_section_discover_item_h3: Start studying at Northern Alberta Institute of Technology (2013)
site_home_section_discover_items.site_home_section_discover_item_p: To challenge myself, I decided to go to college and prove what I've been learnt. I made friends there and improved my communcation skills at school.

site_home_section_discover_items.site_home_section_discover_item_h3: Node, Go Language, Docker, CoreOS, Websocket and more (2014)
site_home_section_discover_items.site_home_section_discover_item_p: Start learning to build networking applications using Node.JS and Go language. I also started learning how to deploy applications in large scale with Docker and CoreOS. With the mature of websocket technology, I started building real-time applications with websocket.
